title: Emerald Blossom Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Cultured Pearls. Showcasing a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A stunning cascade of floral and leaf motifs intricately designed with CZ diamonds. Delicately spaced Emerald accents add a touch of regal charm. The central pendant features a large, lush green emerald surrounded by radiating CZ petals and a single pearl drop. The design harmoniously blends traditional Haaram elements with contemporary aesthetics.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suited for upscale parties
description: This exquisite Haaram is a true masterpiece of craftsmanship. The combination of vibrant Emeralds and sparkling CZ diamonds creates a mesmerizing effect. Its timeless design makes it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection, perfect for heirloom gifting. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a long-lasting luster, preserving its beauty for generations to come.
